attributes.action: Mr R Dyer Mrs M Dyer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hold a referendum on proposed links with the Common Market, as promised by the present government, and ensure that honesty and truthfullness continues under your premiership.

rejection.details: Title does not reflect the point of the petition and is similar to the following: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/LTPD07/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
